template.name: KSA E-Invoicing for POS Retail Shops | Softhealer Technologies

div.p: Our custom-tailored POS system is designed to streamline and simplify your daily business operations, making them effortless and efficient.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12

img.title: KSA E-Invoicing for POS Retail Shops

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center

div.h2: How A Specialized Retail POS System Can Boost Your Business Performance
div.p: Our tailored retail point of sale (POS) system is designed to elevate your business operations, enhance customer experiences, and enable smarter, data-backed decisions. With streamlined planning and organization, your business can boost productivity and drive growth. We offer a comprehensive retail solution for your POS system. Our program includes all the essential features necessary for businesses of all sizes. We meticulously craft every POS element and customize it to match your brand color, ensuring that your POS system is unique and tailored to your business.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center sh_order_box

div.h2: Simplify Your Retail Shop With Our POS And E-Invoicing System
div.p: Our all-in-one retail POS system is fully compatible with KSA E-invoicing regulations and includes features for displaying POS order receipts in your preferred language, with RTL language support available. Choose our solution for seamless invoicing and improved compliance management.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12

img.title: KSA E-Invoicing for POS Retail Shops

header.h6: We offer modern solutions that cater to the unique needs of every industry.

header.h6:
Customize your POS retail experience with over 50
features and themes to meet your needs.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: You can customize the pos theme as per your choice.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to get updated real-time product on-hand quantity.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Set the minimum and maximum sales price in order.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: You can see the order list for a particular customer, from customer details.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: You can see all the orders from the pos screen.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to create a purchase order from the pos screen.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to create sale quotations/orders from the pos screen.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Your customer can see the order details from the portal.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: It allows you to make a signature in each order with a user name.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to share order receipts on customers' WhatsApp.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to print order receipts from the backend.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Set the relative product as a suggestion in products and its display on the pos screen.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: You can make bundle products for the POS.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: It will Lock pos while there is no activity performed in the defined time.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to add bags in order as products with prices.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to cancel the order with delivery and invoice cancellation features.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: This feature displays the total number of products on the pos cart.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: It will create an invoice while you are placing an order.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to change the pricelist for each line in the POS cart.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Just config all shortcuts as per your requirements to perform actions.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to assign more than one barcode for each product.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to add notes for the orders and order line as well.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to manage product return and exchange operations.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: There is an option to remove the product from the order line in the POS cart.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Here you have two types of product view Grid and List.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to define product templates for quick orders.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Apply discount for all products in the pos order cart. Fixed or Percentage.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Display product weight on the pos product screen/cart and the order receipt.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Define the secondary unit of measure for each product.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: It will show variants in particular products. It will Enhance your pos usability.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: You can customize the pos receipt. Print customer details, barcode/QR Code, and Invoice number on pos receipt.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to set the default customer for every order. you can change while the customer making an order.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Just assign users to the pos shop, while they login into Odoo it will redirect to the pos shop.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Here you have 2 types of rounding methods 1. Normal Rounding 2. Rounding up to 50.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Define discount for customers, it will be applied while making an order for those customers.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to update mass products category.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Easy to import orders from excel or CSV.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Search products by their tags.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Set your company logo on the pos screen.
Get step-by-step guidance for every feature of the software with our extensive library of video tutorials.
